column5: Already had my 2018 trip to Manitoba and about roasted in the hot weather! Fish came pre-cooked from the lake! LOL Now looking at 2019 and a few new lodges. Anyone had experience with these lodges and that could give me all the specifics? Looking for big Pike and good (quality and quantity) Walleye.Laurie River LodgeCobham River LodgeLawrence Bay Lodge - Reindeer LakeWollaston Lake LodgeAdditional Suggestions?Thanks!Mike
Great pike and lake trout fishing. The lodge and accommodations are great and the price is right. Leaving next week for our 13th yearly trip.
Thanks Bobs!I wish you the very best of luck on your trip!!!Mike
Mike,I have a few ideas but can you clarify your price range. The places listed above are sort of all over the board from 10k a week to 3500 a week to 2400 a week.Thanks,Brett
